task.title: How to Divide Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instruction about using the Division feature of JPS Calculator app

context.p: To successfully divide numbers, you must know what is Division

result.p: The result from the division is displayed.

taskbody.example: You want to divide 6 by 2. The equation will look like: 6รท2=3. You enter 6. Press divide. Enter 3. Press equals. The result 3 appears on the screen.
